bottom and left gusset knit until 2 sts remain on sock a ssk repeat sock b top and right gusset knit 28 32 36 in pattern k2tog k to end of sock b repeat for sock a round 2 - k all sts repeat these steps until you have 56 64 72 total sts for each sock 28 32 36 on each half rearrange your stitches so you have equal stitches on both sides you ll need an extra needle to move stitches from sock a to the opposite side now onto the foot and toe - the worst is over foot you now have 56 64 72 stitches for each sock 28 32 36 for each half the beginning of the round is at the bottom of sock a you will now continue in the following pattern
